title: Coaches Show on Building a Championship Culture
itunes:title: Coaches Show on Building a Championship Culture
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back on this special episode filled with coaches interviews on building a championship culture. The guys talk with Clemson head football coach Dabo Swinney (2:57), former Ohio State head football coach Urban Meyer (7:41), Penn State head football coach James Franklin (11:23), Notre Dame head football coach Brian Kelly (15:17), Louisville head football coach Scott Satterfield (18:46), Baylor head football coach Matt Rhule (21:16), North Carolina head football coach Mack Brown (25:19), and college football coaching legend Lou Holtz (28:39).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
